attributes.action: Put a temporary suspension on CBT test renewals until lockdown ends.
attributes.additional_details: It's the governments job to assist the people during this stressful time, and due to the restrictions imposed we are being effected in the form of not being able to drive to work, or having to pay out more to actually get to work. Only the government has the power to resolve the issue at hand And potentially save jobs in the process.
attributes.background: We want all CBT's to be temporarily halted, as you're aware we are unable to take our CBT during the restrictions, and some of us rely on this for work. So until all restrictions are relieved, make it legal to ride a motorcycle up to a capacity of 125cc without a valid CBT.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567582
